FuncDef: This command sets the value of the long-lived stale time that is advertised by the router in its LLGR capability. When configured in the long-lived configuration context,advertised-stale-timeapplies to all AFI/SAFI in the advertised LLGR capability except for any AFI/SAFI with a family-specific override. A family-specific override is configured with theadvertised-stale-timecommand in afamilycontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the advertised long-lived stale time in seconds. Values-0 to 16777215.
